title: Incoming calls problems on ny pixel 4
content:
I have a problem with my incoming calls to my pixel 4 device, people ar calling me but its not ringing and it doesn't show it to me, and there is no notifications about incoming calls or miss calls. It doesn't happen every time but its happened a lot!!! 
And its showed to the caller that my phone is turned off!! 

I am pissed of a looot of this going. 
Please any one with a solution?
